sources.title: Hold the Wire (1936)
sources.description: Popeye is wooing Olive on the phone when Bluto comes over. He overhears, taps into the line, and impersonates Popeye. They proceed to have a high-wire fight on the telephone lines outside Olive's house. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/hold-the-wire-1936/

metadata.Plot: Popeye is wooing Olive on the phone when Bluto comes over. He overhears, taps into the line, and impersonates Popeye. They proceed to have a high-wire fight on the telephone lines outside Olive's house.
metadata.Actors: Jack Mercer, Mae Questel, Gus Wicke
